about_the_game:
Two worlds! Two fates! One man who can change it all!       

          

                                                                   Features:

🏆 Beautiful 3D-rendered CG content depicting the story rendered in sharp, crisp 4K resolution for the highest quality.

🏆 Stunning animations at 60 frames per second, showing fights, action and drama with fluid smooth movement.

🏆 A sprawling, world-spanning story with engaging themes of trauma and past mistakes.

🏆 Three main routes, each with their own unique characters, story beats and endings!

🏆 Many branching pathways and alternate endings along the story paths.

Cyrus is in a transitional point of his life, mired in past mistakes, fractured relationships and unresolved trauma. While attempting to restart his life in a new city with a new job, he is thrust into the fantasy world of Cadagan, tasked with taking down the evil insurgent king Monn Molian.

The catch? Due to a mishap in the spell bringing him to Cadagan, Cyrus is now tethered to both worlds, forcing him to alternate days between each and overcome his seemingly-insurmountable and conflicting priorities.

And of course, that isn't the last spanner in the works, with a girl from a long-gone, highly turbulent relationship suddenly reappearing in his life. With a rare second chance to restart and rebuild, Cyrus will take charge, address his past mistakes and seize his bright new future. Or, at least, he hopes!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains implicit references to sexual relations, characters' appearances and bodies. All characters in this game are adults aged 18 or over. Mature themes in the story of all versions include past trauma and dysfunctional relationship dynamics. Frequent profanity is present in the script. Violence is present in the script and renders, and dangerous combat is described and rendered accurately.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 (AMD equiv.) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please install the necessary codecs for WEBP and WEBM if images or animations aren't displaying correctly.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 (AMD equiv.) or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please install the necessary codecs for WEBP and WEBM if images or animations aren't displaying correctly.

name: Past Mistakes -  Act I

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 (AMD equiv.) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please install the necessary codecs for WEBP and WEBM if images or animations aren't displaying correctly.

Derbe Sprache

short_description: See dazzling 4K images and 60FPS animations, and unravel an epic story in the visual novel Past Mistakes! Experience the story of Cyrus, a regular guy with a lot to answer for in his past, as he gets a rare second chance to heal and repair his past mistakes!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
